headline.main: Man Dead After Being Shot by Maryland State Police Trooper
headline.print_headline: Man Dead After Being Shot by Maryland State Police Trooper

docs.snippet: Police say a Maryland man wanted on a warrant for theft is dead after being shot by a state trooper after a struggle....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police say a Maryland man wanted on a warrant for theft is dead after being shot by a state trooper after a struggle.

headline.main: Netanyahu Pressed for Iran Attacks, but Was Denied: Ex-Defense Chief
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Pressed for Iran Attacks, but Was Denied: Ex-Defense Chief

docs.snippet: Israel's political leaders pushed to attack Iran at least three times in the past few years but had to back down on the advice of the military and due to concerns about its ally the United States, former defense minister Ehud Barak said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Israel's political leaders pushed to attack Iran at least three times in the past few years but had to back down on the advice of the military and due to concerns about its ally the United States, former defense minister Ehud Barak said.

headline.main: Indiana Team That Raided Fogle's Home Used Mobile Laboratory
headline.print_headline: Indiana Team That Raided Fogle's Home Used Mobile Laboratory

docs.snippet: When they arrived at Jared Fogle's home last month, law enforcement officials were armed with more than a search warrant: They rolled up with a mobile forensics laboratory that has revolutionized how Indiana investigates child-exploitation and por...
docs.lead_paragraph: When they arrived at Jared Fogle's home last month, law enforcement officials were armed with more than a search warrant: They rolled up with a mobile forensics laboratory that has revolutionized how Indiana investigates child-exploitation and pornography crimes and helped make the state a national model.

headline.main: Toyota Extends Halt in Tianjin Operations Through Wednesday
headline.print_headline: Toyota Extends Halt in Tianjin Operations Through Wednesday

docs.snippet: Toyota Motor Corp said on Saturday its operations near the Chinese port of Tianjin will remain shut at least through Wednesday due to safety concerns as fires continue to break out at the site of last week's deadly chemical explosions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Toyota Motor Corp said on Saturday its operations near the Chinese port of Tianjin will remain shut at least through Wednesday due to safety concerns as fires continue to break out at the site of last week's deadly chemical explosions.

headline.main: China Rocked by Second Deadly Chemical Plant Blast in Two Weeks
headline.print_headline: China Rocked by Second Deadly Chemical Plant Blast in Two Weeks

docs.snippet: A huge explosion ripped through a chemical plant in eastern China, killing one person and injuring nine, Xinhua news agency said, less than two weeks after two deadly blasts destroyed a warehouse storing chemicals in the northeast....
docs.lead_paragraph: A huge explosion ripped through a chemical plant in eastern China, killing one person and injuring nine, Xinhua news agency said, less than two weeks after two deadly blasts destroyed a warehouse storing chemicals in the northeast.

headline.main: Services Held for Woman Believed to Be Oldest US Veteran
headline.print_headline: Services Held for Woman Believed to Be Oldest US Veteran

docs.snippet: Funeral services were held in Detroit for a woman who was believed to be the oldest U.S. veteran at the time of her death....
docs.lead_paragraph: Funeral services were held in Detroit for a woman who was believed to be the oldest U.S. veteran at the time of her death.

headline.main: Riot Over Refugees in Eastern German Town Leaves 31 Police Hurt
headline.print_headline: Riot Over Refugees in Eastern German Town Leaves 31 Police Hurt

docs.snippet: At least 31 German police officers were hurt in scuffles with about 600 protesters, many hurling bottles and stones, angry about the arrival of asylum seekers in an eastern German town in the early hours of Saturday, police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: At least 31 German police officers were hurt in scuffles with about 600 protesters, many hurling bottles and stones, angry about the arrival of asylum seekers in an eastern German town in the early hours of Saturday, police said.

docs.snippet: Police in Azerbaijan have detained 21 people after they held a protest to demand justice for a man who died in police custody in the western town of Mingachevir....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police in Azerbaijan have detained 21 people after they held a protest to demand justice for a man who died in police custody in the western town of Mingachevir.

headline.main: Egyptian court sentences Muslim Brotherhood leader to life in prison
headline.sub: Egyptian court sentences Muslim Brotherhood leader to life in prison

docs.snippet: Muslim Brotherhood leader Mohamed Badie and other prominent Brotherhood figures are sentenced to life in prison on charges related to a deadly attack in 2013. Pavithra George reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Muslim Brotherhood leader Mohamed Badie and other prominent Brotherhood figures are sentenced to life in prison on charges related to a deadly attack in 2013. Pavithra George reports.

headline.main: Bombing the Latest of Many Challenges for Thailand's Junta
headline.print_headline: Bombing the Latest of Many Challenges for Thailand's Junta

docs.snippet: When a military coup last year ended months of political turmoil and violence in Thailand, even some democracy advocates welcomed the junta's promise to restore stability and return "happiness to the people."...
docs.lead_paragraph: When a military coup last year ended months of political turmoil and violence in Thailand, even some democracy advocates welcomed the junta's promise to restore stability and return "happiness to the people."
